landing-page.headline: Governing Bodies
landing-page.subline: The Synthetix Protocol is governed by four bodies, each responsible for a core aspect of a DAO.
landing-page.second-subline: Find links to each core component of the Synthetix Governance System
landing-page.tabs-subline: The current members of each Synthetix Governing Body

button-cards.all-members-subline: View the history of past council elections and vote in any currently open elections.
button-cards.sccp-subline: View the current status of all SCCPs and SIPs.
button-cards.forum-subline: Join the community governance discussion in realtime.
button-cards.records-subline: View the voting history of all governance proposals.

councils.headline: Our Current Elected Members
councils.subline: Meet each of the nominees for the new and up and coming elections for the Synthetix governing bodies, each responsible for a core aspect of the DAO.

profile-not-found.subheadline: {{walletAddress}} is not a valid wallet address or profile does not exists for user

completion-card.headline: Your Submission Summary {{percentage}} Complete
completion-card.subline: Complete all of the submission requirements to enhance your chances of becoming a council member

vote.headline: Voting
vote.subline: Chose one nominee that you want to vote for in this election. Remember to check out their profile & pitch to see what they represent.
vote.vote-in-progress: You have not completed all of your ballots for this voting period. Below indicates which ones you completed and which ones have not. Click on the plus icon to cast your vote.
vote.vote-finished: You have completed all of your ballots for this voting period. You can always change your casted votes within the voting period.
vote.not-in-voting: {{council}} Council is not in voting period.

pre-eval.headline: Current Voting Results
pre-eval.voting-results-live: Voting is still in progress. There is still time to vote if you haven't yet.

nomination.headline: Nominate Self
nomination.subline: Chose a governing body that you would like to represent if chosen as an elected member

withdraw.headline: Withdraw Nomination
withdraw.subline: A candidate can withdrawal from the nomination process at any given time within the nomination period

edit.headline: Edit Your Nomination
edit.subline: You can only nominate for 1 council at any given time. In order to change your nomination from one council to another you must first select your new council and click save. You will be need to sign 2 transactions in order to change.
edit.banner: You will need to sign 2 transactions to change council.

vote.headline: Voting For {{council}} Council Nominee
vote.subline: You are about to vote for this nominee. If you are happy to proceed, click the submit vote button.

voting-power.headline: Your Total Voting Power Is On L1 & L2:

withdraw-vote.headline: Uncast Vote
withdraw-vote.subline: You are about to uncast your vote. Select uncast vote button to continue.

editProfile.headline: Edit Profile
editProfile.subheadline: Update your profile with more information about yourself

placeholder.delegationPitch: e.g I am a OG Synthetix Community Member.
